snippet: The Supreme Court justices heard arguments on whether the government still has good reason to regulate cursing and nudity on broadcast television.
abstract: Supreme Court hears arguments on whether the government still has good reason to regulate cursing and nudity on broadcast television.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court justices heard arguments on whether the government still has good reason to regulate cursing and nudity on broadcast television.

headline.seo: Justices Weigh Relevance of TV Indecency Laws
headline.main: TV Decency Is a Puzzler for Justices
headline.print_headline: TV Decency Is a Puzzler For Justices
